sections.title: Verse 1
content: Let us bring our gifts to God,
He has given all we hold,
Now we give Him back His grace.

sections.title: Verse 2
content: Let us bring our time and hands,
Let us bring our hearts and minds,

sections.title: Verse 3
content: Let us bring our thanks today,

sections.title: Verse 4
content: Let us bring our lives anew,
Take what we are, make us whole,
